name: Pyramid Solitaire - Classic Solitaire Games Free
name_original: Pyramid Solitaire - Classic Solitaire Games Free
description:
Pyramid Solitaire will launch a brand new one with the most classical playing method!

Pyramid Solitaire, a casual game that will bring you so much fun. Combine two cards and guarantee the sum of numbers on the two cards to be 13 to remove the two cards. More cards you remove, more points will you get!

This game is full of challenges and will get you unlimited fun. It will always be the option when you guys are at your leisure time.

After playing a board game you can check your ranking in the ranking list. Try best to score high!
